name: Hirbel's Protective Skin
description: Forged from the scales of a great wurm's impenetrable hide.

name: Autumn Fire
description: Made to give the wearer the appearance of a fire breathing wurm.
benefit: Benefit. Attacks deal an additional 1d4 fire damage.

name: Sun-Touched Chainmail of Hyran Rath
description: An armor created to combat creatures suchs as ghouls and vampires.
benefit: Benefit. You have advantage on checks to avoid the effects of poison and disease.

name: Wurmwull
description: Protects the wearer from the slashing claws and fiery breath of a great wurm.
benefit: Benefit. Reduces physical damage by 1 and reduces fire damage by 3 (minimum of 1).

name: Heldrik's Coat
description: Provides additional padding to protect the wearer from the bitter cold.
benefit: Benefit. Reduces cold damage by 3 (minimum of 1) and you have advantage on checks to avoid the effects paralyze.

name: Coat of Ill Payment
description: Attackers will recoil in pain after successfully landing their blows.
benefit: Benefit. Attackers within close range take 1 point of damage when they strike you.

name: Angio's Gambeson
description: Aids in performing jawdropping feats that seem to defy the laws of nature and good sense alike.
benefit: Benefit. Your Dexterity stat is increased by 2 (to a maximum of 20).

name: Elryn's Jacket
description: Where most padded armor is constructed in vertical strips, this one bears a distinctive diamond pattern.
benefit: Benefit. Your Wisdom stat is increased by 2 (to a maximum of 20).

name: Blaidh Golan
description: Blaidh Golan, or Wolf Heart, is said to have been blessed by Jezelda herself.
benefit: Benefit. You have advantage on checks to avoid the effects paralyze.

name: Rebel's Call
description: Revolutionaries from Galt struck fear into the hear of the Empire of Taldor.
